meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that staphs are bacteria that can cause infections.
meanings.sent2: I heard that staphs are commonly found on the skin.
meanings.sent3: The group of staphs gathered for a tiny party under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The staphs multiplied rapidly, like a colony expanding its territory.
meanings.sent5: Be cautious of staphs, they can be harmful if not treated properly.

meanings.definition: Staphs: third person singular present of staph
meanings.sent1: She staphs the wound carefully to prevent infection.
meanings.sent2: He always staphs the equipment after each use.
meanings.sent3: The robot staphs the assembly line with precision and speed.
meanings.sent4: Time seems to staphs when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to staphs the leak before it gets worse.
